name: winter carnival '21: 東方難昔 "burning silvergun"
name_original: winter carnival '21: 東方難昔 "burning silvergun"
description:
nitori helps out with a robot army gone awry in another hudsonsoft/naxat worship caravan shmup

this time, take some gameplay strategy from radiant silvergun and increase your combo score multiplier by blasting 3 robots in a row. stack 3 of the same color again to double it! find and destroy the hidden tiles to rack up a secret combo bonus

things to fix:
easy mode way too easy hard mode is just weird
apparently i forgot about adding sfx about halfway thru
currently you always get a free no-miss bonus when you complete the stage. oh well live with it

arrow keys/d-pad/thumbstick: move nitori
z/a button: shoot straight
x/b button: shoot homing
esc/start: pause
r/back: return to main menu
f: toggle fullscreen

all engine code, design, art, sfx, bgm made by t. boddy in under 72 hours for touhou gamejam no. 6
